name: Challenge #5: Mistery cities & Passenger
description: It's the same task as the last challenge, except in this one you can't see the city ids and who tells you the way is the passenger! Tip: City ids randomly change each run, so, pay attention.
shortDocumentation:
In this challenge your task is to move the single passenger to his desired destination.

Vehicle Class

moveTo(targetCity) Method
- targetCity can be an string with the city ID or an instance of City

victory.text: Deliver the single passenger to his desired destination.
